description: Triangle T(n,k) of k-block tricoverings of an n-set (n >= 3, k >= 4).
comments: A covering of a set is a tricovering if every element of the set is covered by exactly three blocks of the covering.
formula: E.g.f. for k-block tricoverings of an n-set is exp(-x+x^2/2+(exp(y)-1)*x^3/3)*Sum_{k=0..inf}x^k/k!*exp(-1/2*x^2*exp(k*y))*exp(binomial(k, 3)*y).
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 20 2001
